attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bernie Ecclestone has done more for the British motorsport industry than anybody else. He has made Formula 1 a huge success and as a British entreupener he deserves recognition.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
